definition: to put on airs/to assume great airs
to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum
to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Here we get to eat as much as we want, and the men don't bother us!
sentences.chinese: 我們不愁喫不愁穿，又沒有臭男人擺架子。

sentences.english: I like Norma because she's genuine person and never puts on side.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜歡諾馬，因爲她坦率真誠，從不擺架子。

sentences.english: Nobody can say I put on airs. I'm actually very humble.
sentences.chinese: 誰也不能說我這人擺架子，事實上我是很謙虛的人。

sentences.english: He can't stand for those who put on airs .
sentences.chinese: 他不能容忍擺架子的人。

sentences.english: Don’t try to pull rank on me. We’re all equals here.
sentences.chinese: 別對我擺架子，這裏人人平等。

sentences.english: She simply can't stand for those who put on airs.
sentences.chinese: 她簡直不能容忍那些擺架子的人。

sentences.english: We must respect the masses and avoid putting on airs.
sentences.chinese: 我們要尊重羣衆，不要擺架子。

sentences.english: Geez, the guy gets a solo adventure and he gets all snippy.
sentences.chinese: 去，這傢伙跑了段單人劇情就開始擺架子了。

sentences.english: Norma because she's genuine person and never puts on side.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜歡諾馬，因爲她坦率真誠，從不擺架子。

sentences.english: Although she is a successful career woman, she never puts on airs.
sentences.chinese: 雖然她是個事有成的職業婦女，確從不擺架子。

sentences.english: He always put on airs with me, as if he was the boss.
sentences.chinese: 他總是對我擺架子，就好像他是老闆一樣。

sentences.english: That important man is very unassuming in his manner.
sentences.chinese: 那個要人彬彬有禮，是一位毫不擺架子的人。

sentences.english: But regardless of how much each person ends up paying, no one should feel the right to put on airs as a result.
sentences.chinese: 不過甭管付了多少錢，擺架子端姿態都是不應該的吧。

sentences.english: I find I can't stand for those who put on airs.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我不能忍受那些擺架子的人。
